properties.Name: VcfContig
properties.Description:
These contain the contig names, lengths, and which reference assembly was used with the input BAM file.

As with chromosomal sequences it is highly recommended (but not required) that the header include tags describing the contigs referred to in the VCF file. This furthermore allows these contigs to come from different files. The format is identical to that of a reference sequence, but with an additional URL tag to indicate where that sequence can be found.

Columns.Name: ReferenceFile
Columns.Description:
The version of the VCF specification to which the file conforms.

In the flat file received this line will begin with ##reference.

Columns.Name: GeneSequencingFileFormatId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a gene sequencing file format.

Columns.Name: ContigId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of the contig.

Columns.Name: ContigUrl
Columns.Description: The reference assembly used with the input BAM file.

Columns.Name: ContigReferenceAssemblyName
Columns.Description: The contig reference assembly used with the input BAM file.
